specific_question: What proportion of our software quality assurance testing time is spent on user experience and interface issues in Q2 2025?
answer: By Q2 2025, 50% of our software quality assurance testing time will be dedicated to user experience and interface issues.
justification: This answer provides a quantitative snapshot of our current software testing priorities, helping us identify areas to optimize for electric vehicle production.
dr_question: How can Elexion Automotive’s quality assurance processes be optimized to address the unique challenges of electric vehicle production, such as software and user experience issues, compared to gasoline cars?
